name: I HATE DEADLINES, MOTHER
description:
WARNING: This game has Disturbing imagery, Strong Language, and Loud Disturbing noises!

When the game ends you will have to exit through Windows

This game is more of a Self-Expression of Anger and Depression. Not really meant to be played by that many people. But if it looks neat you can check it out.

A psychological platformer made under a deadline (Before my Birthday)

Doki Doki!!!

-John Montoya

P.S. When it says "F### you" it's not referring to you. I love you
